title: CERN: World's Most Powerful Machine is set to Create Unimagined Scientific Phenomena, Sept 2015
content:
In September, Europe's Large Hadron Collider (LHC) will smash together sub-atomic particles at nearly the speed of light, an unprecedented experiment
